PHRASE.LANG:

 These locomotion objects will boost your speed.
 
 Speed:
 ・Standard = 5.25m/s
 
 This bundle contains:
 (1) Animal Avatars - Safari - Mandrill
 (2) Animal Avatars - Safari - Hippo
 (3) Animal Avatars - Safari - Zebra
 
 ※These items are portable items. [#Legal]
